item.title: ðŸ¤—Transformers: Training a T5 Transformer Model - Generating ArXiv Paper's Titles from Abstracts
item.author: Author
item.description: In this article, we will see how to use a T5 model to generate research paper’s title based on paper’s abstracts. T5 model is seq-to-seq model i.e. A Sequence to Sequence model fully capable to perform any text to text tasks. What does it mean - It means that T5 model can take any input text and convert it into any output text. Such text-to-text conversion is useful in NLP tasks like language translation, summarization etc.
